objects.text:
• 5G PURE CREATINE PER SERVING
• MIXED BERRY FLAVOR
• FASTER ABSORPTION WITH ASTRAGIN
• 150 GUMMIES, 30 SERVINGS

product_details.name: Force Factor Creatine Gummies, 5 Grams Creatine Monohydrate for Muscle Gain, More Strength, and Faster Recovery, Mixed Berry, 150 Gummies, 30 Servings
product_details.description:
- Introducing Force Factor Creatine Gummies: the delicious and convenient way to fuel your performance and achieve your fitness goals.
- Absorbing faster than regular creatine thanks to the inclusion of AstraGin, a patented ginseng extract, these gummies ensure more effective results with every serving.
- Formulated to help you build lean muscle and strength, each creatine gummy serving packs a clinically studied 5g dose of creatine, verified by third-party testing for potency and purity.
- Sweet and flavorful, these gummies make post-workout refueling a treat, without the hassle of messy powders or creatine settling at the bottom of your shaker cup.
- Made in the USA in GMP-certified facilities, you can trust Force Factor Creatine Gummies for quality and safety every step of the way.
- Elevate your workouts with confidence and convenience.

banner_details:
This bold and visually striking banner highlights a fitness supplement product. It has a quadrant layout with a split-color background: dark grayscale in the top half and vibrant red hues in the bottom half, creating strong contrast. A large product image is placed on the right, overlapping quadrants for depth. Key text elements include a bold product name ("heading" and "subheading"), brand label ("brand"), benefit tagline ("tagline"), detailed features ("description"), and pricing ("price"). A call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta") is prominently displayed at the bottom left. 

The design features subtle background shapes like circles and chevrons, adding dimensionality.

**Color Palette:**
- Black (#000000)
- Charcoal Gray (#1F1F1F)
- Dark Gray (#2D2D2D)
- Vivid Red (#E81E1E)
- Deep Red (#CC1919)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a bold and energetic color palette dominated by red, black, and white, ideal for sports and health-focused advertising. Red (#E91919) is used prominently in the bottom band and textual highlights to convey strength and urgency. The black (#000000) lid and bold text emphasize power and readability, while white (#FFFFFF) provides a clean background to enhance contrast and clarity. Purple (#7A1E84) and blue (#2E3E9E) are used subtly in the flavor label and berries, adding a complementary balance. The colors are blended via clear separation and contrast, each being highlighted purposefully to draw attention to key information.
